title: Hitozuma Cosplay Kissa (Cosplay Cafe)
synopsis: There's a coffee shop that attracts a lot of customers, but not because of the coffee, but because of the waitresses who are all married women wearing outfits that normal waitresses wouldn't wear.
related_anime: ['Hitozuma Cosplay Kissa 2: Hitozuma LoveLove - Cosplay OVA', 'Hitozuma Cosplay Kissa']
